\begin{center}
`r params$date`\
\end{center}
***

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = params$root)

works <- list()
analyses <- list()
files <- strsplit(params$files,'-')
for( f in files[[1]]){analyses <- c(analyses,paste(strsplit(f,'/')[[1]][1],strsplit(f,'/')[[1]][2],sep='/'))}
for( f in files[[1]]){works <- c(works,strsplit(f,'/')[[1]][1])}
analyses <- unique(analyses)
works <- unique(works)


```

# OVERVIEW
```{r, overwiev, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
files <- strsplit(params$files,'-')
for (w in 1:length(works[[1]])) {
  cat('\n')
  cat(paste('- ',works[[1]][w]))
  cat('\n')
  }
```
